javadoc:
The RTTI3 data type represents a ClassHierarchyDescriptor structure.

Fields for this RunTimeTypeInformation structure can be found on http://www.openrce.org 

 struct ClassHierarchyDescriptor {
     dword signature;
     dword attributes;                  // bit flags
     dword numBaseClasses;              // count of RTTI 1 ref entries in RTTI 2 array
     4byte_ptr_or_disp pBaseClassArray; // ref to BaseClassArray (RTTI 2)
 }

RTTI_Class_Hierarchy_Descriptor is the label for the RTTI3 data structure. @deprecated Use of this dynamic data type class is no longer recommended. Instead a ClassHierarchyDescriptor structure data type can be obtained using the Rtti3Model.

methods.javadoc: Creates a dynamic Class Hierarchy Descriptor data type.
methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Creates a dynamic Class Hierarchy Descriptor data type.

methods.javadoc:
Creates a dynamic Class Hierarchy Descriptor data type.
@param dtm the data type manager for this data type.
methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Creates a dynamic Class Hierarchy Descriptor data type.

params.name: dtm
params.comment: the data type manager for this data type.

methods.name: getLength
methods.comment:
Gets the total length of the data created when this data type is placed at the indicated 
 address in memory.

params.name: memory
params.comment: the program memory for this data.

params.name: address
params.comment: the start address of the data.

return.comment:
the length of the data. zero is returned if valid data can't be created at the 
 indicated address using this data type.

methods.name: getRtti1Count
methods.comment:
Gets the number of RTTI1 structures that are referred to by an RTTI3 structure being placed
 at the rtti3Address of the indicated memory.

params.name: memory
params.comment: the memory with the data for the RTTI structures.

methods.name: getRtti2Address
methods.comment:
Gets the address of the RTTI2 that is referred to from an RTTI3 structure that is placed at 
 the indicated address.

params.name: memory
params.comment: the memory with the data for the RTTI structures.

return.comment: the address of the RTTI2 structure or null.

name: RTTI3DataType
